context: Hi! What's your pleasure? War? Black Hawk Down (2002) is a favorite of mine
I don't really enjoy war movies. I much prefer horror. My favorites are The Shining (1980) , The Witch (2015) and Resolution (2012)

resp: Again, I preferred the book! World War Z was good too
